project.description:
This jenkins job is used to build Tizen sources. This job is based on repo and GBS. Developers can reconfigure this job to run periodically, of course can be triggered at anytime needed.

With PUBLISH enabled, build artifacts, including build reports, repos and images, will be synchronized to respective download servers.

Note: To get a better understanding of this job, it is highly recommended that the following document, which provides instructions of the corresponding manual operations, is read and well understood: Creating a Tizen Image from Scratch

The following options are supported by this jenkins job:

MANIFEST_URL

The manifest url, which should be recognized by repo command, for example: review.tizen.org:scm/manifest, where review.tizen.org is the alias name set in ~/.ssh, like:

Host review.tizen.org
Hostname review.tizen.org
Port 29418
User <username>
#ProxyCommand connect -S <proxy>:<port> %h %p

and, scm/manifest is the manifest path in remote tizen.org gerrit.

MANIFEST_BRANCHES
This option specifies the manifest branch used for syncing code, this value will be passed to repo command directly.
PROFILE
This option specifies the target profile, valid values: IVI, Mobile.
ARCH
This option specifies the arch to be built, valid values: i586 and armv7l.
REMOTE_REPOS
The remote repos for doing local full build using gbs, and get ks file for image creation.
PARALEL_THREADS
This option determines how many builder gbs should run in parallel
EXCLUDE_PACKAGES
This option specifies the packages that does not participate in building. And also can be used to break dependency cycles.
BUILD_ARGS
Specify more gbs build options. For more gbs build options and usage refer to gbs build usage. Default value: empty.
PUBLISH
This option enables the publishing of build artifacts to respective download servers. Build artifacts include report, images and repos.
PUBLISH_URL
Specify the URL address to publish build artifacts. The format of PUBLISH_URL should be the same as rsync format which can be a local path or remote url like: user@hostname:/path/to/publish_dir. This option only take effect if PUBLISH is enabled.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MANIFEST_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
The manifest url, which should be recognized by repo command, for example: review.tizen.org:scm/manifest, where review.tizen.org is the alias name set in ~/.ssh, like:

Host review.tizen.org
Hostname review.tizen.org
Port 29418
User <username>
#ProxyCommand connect -S <proxy>:<port> %h %p

and, scm/manifest is the manifest path in remote tizen.org gerrit.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MANIFEST_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This option specifies the manifest branch used for syncing code, this value will be passed to repo command directly.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: PROFILE
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: This option specifies the target profile, valid values: <cite>IVI</cite>, <cite>Mobile</cite>.

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: REMOTE_REPOS
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: The remote repos for doing local full build using gbs, and get ks file for image creation. Example: http://download.tizen.org/releases/daily/tizen/ivi/ivi/tizen_20140212.7/

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: ARCH
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: This option specifies the arch to be built, valid values: <cite>i586</cite>

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PARALEL_THREADS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This option determines how many builder gbs should run in parallel.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: EXCLUDE_PACKAGES
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This option specifies the packages that does not participate in building. And also can be used to break dependency cycles.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_ARGS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify more gbs build options. For more gbs build options and usage refer to gbs build usage. Default value: empty.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: PUBLISH
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: This option enables the publishing of build artifacts to respective download servers. Build artifacts include report, images and repos..

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PUBLISH_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify the URL address to publish build artifacts. The format of <cite>PUBLISH_URL</cite> should be the same as rsync format which can be a local path or remote url like: <cite>user@hostname:/path/to/publish_dir</cite>. This option only take effect if PUBLISH is enabled.
